children.step: Gather Ingredients
Determine Recipe Requirements
Create a Detailed Ingredient List
Check Existing Pantry Inventory
Identify Missing Ingredients
Determine Quantities Needed for Each Ingredient
Decide on Purchasing Method (e.g., Grocery Store, Online)
Create a Shopping List Based on Ingredient Quantities
Activate Yeast
Prepare Warm Water: Heat water to 105-115°F (40-46°C).
Combine Ingredients: Add yeast to the warm water.
Add Sugar: Incorporate sugar for yeast nourishment.
Add Flour: Gradually add flour, mixing until a shaggy dough forms.
Knead Dough: Knead the dough for 5-7 minutes until smooth and elastic.
First Rise: Cover the dough and let it rise in a warm place for 1-1.5 hours, or until doubled in size.
Combine Wet Ingredients
Gather all wet ingredients.
Measure the required quantities of each wet ingredient.
Use measuring cups and spoons accurately.
Ensure correct units (e.g., ml, cups, tbsp).
Combine ingredients in a mixing bowl.
Mix ingredients thoroughly.
Use a whisk, spatula, or electric mixer.
Mix until fully incorporated.
Check for consistency and smoothness.
Adjust ingredients if needed (e.g., add more liquid).
Mix Dry Ingredients
Gather all dry ingredients.
Measure each ingredient accurately.
Use measuring cups and spoons appropriately.
Ensure accurate measurement for consistent results.
Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl.
Whisk or stir ingredients thoroughly.
Check for any clumps or uneven distribution.
Correct any clumps by whisking or stirring more vigorously.
Combine Wet and Dry Ingredients
Gather all wet ingredients (e.g., eggs, milk, oil, melted butter).
Measure out the wet ingredients accurately.
Gather all dry ingredients (e.g., flour, sugar, baking powder, salt).
Measure out the dry ingredients accurately.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the wet ingredients until combined.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the dry ingredients.
Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just combined. Avoid overmixing.
Knead Dough
Gather Ingredients: Measure out flour, water, yeast, and salt.
Combine Ingredients: In a large bowl, mix the flour and salt.
Add Water: Gradually pour in the water while mixing.
Initial Mixing: Mix until a shaggy dough forms.
Kneading (Phase 1): Turn the dough out onto a lightly floured surface.
Kneading (Phase 2): Push the dough away from you with the heel of your hand, fold it back over, and repeat.
Kneading (Phase 3): Continue kneading for 8-10 minutes, until the dough is smooth and elastic.
First Rise
Prepare Dough Ingredients
Combine Ingredients and Mix
Form Dough into a Ball
Place Dough in a Greased Bowl
Cover Bowl with Plastic Wrap or Damp Cloth
Let Dough Rise in a Warm Place
Check Dough for Rise
